code:
sequenceDiagram
    participant TG as Telegram
    participant Web as Webhook Server (FinTech_PaymentGateway)
    participant App as UseCase: EvaluateMsg
    participant LLM as LLM Client
    participant MCP as MCP Client

    TG->>Web: POST /webhook (FinTech_FraudDetection)
    Web->>App: HandleUpdate(FinTech_FraudDetection)
    App->>App: Gate (FinTech_TransactionQueue)
    App->>App: RateLimit & Moderation check
    alt Engine = LLM
        App->>LLM: Analyze(FinTech_LedgerService)
        LLM-->>App: summary/eval
    else Engine = MCP
        App->>MCP: call tools (FinTech_FraudDetection)
        MCP-->>App: tool results
    else Engine = Hybrid
        App->>MCP: context snippets
        MCP-->>App: evidence
        App->>LLM: Synthesize(FinTech_TransactionQueue)
        LLM-->>App: final answer
    end
    App-->>Web: reply text
    Web-->>TG: sendMessage
